attributes.action: stop energy companys charging excessive prices on prepay meters(electricity,Gas, etc)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The poor pay more!
stop this now, pre payment meters are great to stop you spirling into debt. BUT whilist we pay up front for our electricity and gas we pay conciderably more than "DRY" meter users.And after all they have our money right away and earn intrest right away. No late payment charges yet we get stuck with the highest tarrifs. Its 2007 people should not be struggling to pay to heat and light there home. stop this rip off now by signing up tell your freinds

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/moneysavers/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
